com.mycompany.mbean

Class ShoppingCartMB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.mbean.ShoppingCartMB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Named(value="shoppingCartMB")
@SessionScoped
public class ShoppingCartMB
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Shopping Cart managed bean is used to perform all shopping related information. For example add to cart, remove from cart etc will be handled by this class.
    See Also:
